inclusion.criterion: willing and able to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: male or female participants, aged 18 years or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: receiving SoC medications for WD treatment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to understand and comply with study procedures
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: adequate venous access for blood samples
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: major systemic disease or other illness
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: likely to be non-compliant or uncooperative
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of tremors and Wilson disease confirmed by high liver copper concentration.
